summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west 1/2 of the north 293-4/12' of NW 1/4 of NW 1/4 lying west of centerline of 31st Avenue West produce south less the north 30' and less the east 8' less south 160' less west 70' being Tax Lot 42 of Section 23-25-3, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-419 and 17-308, respectively.
